abilities.name: Fluffy Cotton
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Energy Blow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Toy Box-GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
